00042 Output::~Output( void ){
00043   ar_.clear();

00047 void
00048 Output::getAR( void ) {
00049   std::cout << " in getAR..." << std::endl;
00050   unsigned npart, nvpart;
00051   float Xc, Yc, Zc, VXc, VYc, VZc;
00052   float Mvir, Rvir, Vmax, Rmax, sigV;
00053   float lambda, Jx, Jy, Jz;
00054   float a, Eax, Eay, Eaz;
00055   float b, Ebx, Eby, Ebz;
00056   float c, Ecx, Ecy, Ecz;
00057   float ovdens, Redge;
00058   int nbins;
00059   float Ekin, Epot;
00060   float mbp_offset, com_offset;
00061   float r2, lambdaE;
00062 
00063   std::fstream ahfhalos((Folder("output") + Snaps(sim_.getIsnap()) 
00064              + "/ahf_out_halos2").c_str(), std::ios::in);
00065   for(int i=0; i<sim_.getNhalo(); ++i){
00066     npart = nvpart = 0;
00067     Xc=Yc=Zc=VXc=VYc=VZc=Mvir=Rvir=Vmax=Rmax=sigV=lambda=Jx=Jy=Jz=0.0;
00068     a=Eax=Eay=Eaz=b=Ebx=Eby=Ebz=c=Ecx=Ecy=Ecz=ovdens=Redge=0.0;
00069     nbins=0;
00070     Ekin=Epot=mbp_offset=com_offset=r2=lambdaE=0.0;
00071     ahfhalos >> npart >> nvpart>> Xc    >> Yc   >> Zc
00072          >> VXc   >> VYc   >> VZc
00073          >> Mvir  >> Rvir
00074          >> Vmax  >> Rmax
00075          >> sigV
00076          >> lambda
00077          >> Jx    >> Jy    >> Jz
00078          >> a     >> Eax   >> Eay   >> Eaz
00079          >> b     >> Ebx   >> Eby   >> Ebz
00080          >> c     >> Ecx   >> Ecy   >> Ecz
00081          >> ovdens
00082          >> Redge
00083          >> nbins
00084          >> Ekin   >> Epot 
00085          >> mbp_offset >> com_offset 
00086          >> r2 
00087          >> lambdaE;
00088     AResults arn = AResults(npart,nvpart,Xc,Yc,Zc,VXc,VYc,VZc,
00089                 Mvir,Rvir,Vmax,Rmax,sigV,
00090                 lambda,Jx,Jy,Jz,
00091                 a,Eax,Eay,Eaz,b,Ebx,Eby,Ebz,c,Ecx,Ecy,Ecz,
00092                 ovdens,Redge,nbins,Ekin,Epot,
00093                 mbp_offset,com_offset,
00094                 r2,lambdaE);
00095     ar_.push_back(arn);
00096   }
00097   ahfhalos.close();
00098 }
00099 
00100 void
00101 Output::writeAR( void ){
00102   std::cout << " in writeAR()..." << std::endl;
00103   std::string filename = Folder("output")+Snaps(sim_.getIsnap())
00104     +"/Aprop.txt";
00105   std::ofstream file(filename.c_str());
00106   for(int i=0; i<sim_.getNhalo(); ++i){
00107     file << ar_.at(i).toString() << std::endl;
00108   }
00109   file.close();
00110 }

00112 void
00113 Output::fillHRglobal( int Ntot, real Mtot, real Rtot, real Mvir, real Rvir,
00114               Vector3 xcm, Vector3 vcm, Vector3 xmb, Vector3 vmb ){
00115   tmp_.setNtot(Ntot);
00116   tmp_.setMtot(Mtot);
00117   tmp_.setRtot(Rtot);
00118   tmp_.setMvir(Mvir);
00119   tmp_.setRvir(Rvir);
00120   tmp_.setXCM(xcm);
00121   tmp_.setVCM(vcm);
00122   tmp_.setXMB(xmb);
00123   tmp_.setVMB(vmb);
00124 }
00125 
00126 void 
00127 Output::fillHRtype( int type, int npart, real mpart, real lambda, 
00128             real sigma, Vector3 J, Eigensystem3 E ){
00129   tmp_.setNpart(npart,type);
00130   tmp_.setMpart(mpart,type);
00131   tmp_.setJ(J,type);
00132   tmp_.setE(E,type);
00133   tmp_.setLambda(lambda,type);
00134   tmp_.setSigma(sigma,type);
00135 }
00136 
00137 void
00138 Output::appendHR( void ){
00139   hr_.push_back(tmp_);
00140 }
00141 
00142 void
00143 Output::writeHR( void ) {
00144   int nhalo = sim_.getNhalo();
00145   std::string filename = Folder("output") + Snaps(sim_.getIsnap()) 
00146     + "/Hprop.txt";
00147   std::ofstream file(filename.c_str());
00148 
00149   file << sim_.getBoxlength() << " " << sim_.getZsnap() 
00150        << " " << nhalo << std::endl;
00151   for(int i=0;i<nhalo;++i){
00152     file << i << " " << hr_.at(i).toString() << std::endl;
00153   }
00154   file.close();
00155 }

00166   }
